music.beat: Returns the duration of a beat in milli-seconds
music.builtInMelody: Gets the melody array of a built-in melody.
music.changeTempoBy: Change the tempo by the specified amount
music.changeTempoBy|param|bpm: The change in beats per minute to the tempo, eg: 20
music.noteFrequency: Gets the frequency of a note.
music.playTone: Plays a tone through the pin for the given duration.
music.playTone|param|frequency: pitch of the tone to play in Hertz (Hz)
music.rest: Rests (plays nothing) for a specified time.
music.ringTone|param|frequency: pitch of the tone to play in Hertz (Hz)
music.setOutput: Sets the output destination for sounds generated by the music package
music.setOutput|param|out: the destination for sounds generated by the music package
music.setSpeakerVolume: Sets the output volume of the on board speaker (if available)
music.onEvent: Registers code to run on various melody events
music.setTempo: Sets the tempo to the specified amount
music.setTempo|param|bpm: The new tempo in beats per minute, eg: 120
music.startMelody:
Starts playing a melody through pin ``P0``.
Notes are expressed as a string of characters with this format: NOTE[octave][:duration]
music.startMelody|param|options: melody options, once / forever, in the foreground / background
music.tempo: Returns the tempo in beats per minute. Tempo is the speed (bpm = beats per minute) at which notes play. The larger the tempo value, the faster the notes will play.
